mapper.insert: insert into p_user (u_Id, u_FirstName, u_LastName, u_Email, u_password, u_Phone, u_UserSatus) values (#{u_Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{u_FirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_LastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_Email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_Phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_UserSatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update p_user set u_FirstName = #{u_FirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_LastName = #{u_LastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_Email = #{u_Email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_password = #{u_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_Phone = #{u_Phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_UserSatus = #{u_UserSatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where u_Id = #{u_Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select u_Id, u_FirstName, u_LastName, u_Email, u_password, u_Phone, u_UserSatus from p_user
select * from p_User where u_LastName = #{name} and u_password = #{pwd};
